channel.title: Banned from moparscape
channel.description: Um yah. I don't know if this the wrong section or whatever. But I'm banned from moparscape for something I didn't even do. Apparently I'm banned for posting a link to virus on the server status page. My account was hacked and whatever a while back ago or something like that and now I'm banned from posting and everything. Not sure what I should do. So if an admin or someone can help me figure this all out that would be great. Sorry if this is the wrong section and not even on the website. I just don't know what to do. I have pmed Moparisthebest on moparscape but now I can't even get on the site. Any help would be great. Thanks everyone.

item.title: Banned from moparscape
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Clearing your cookies should work.

Read full topic
